trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the persistence service cannot fulfill a request.
trans-unit.target: 지 속성 서비스에서 요청을 처리할 수 없는 경우 throw 되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> throws a PersistenceException if it cannot complete a request to commit either a completed scope or the workflow instance state to its database.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>완료 된 범위나 워크플로 인스턴스 상태를 데이터베이스에 커밋하기 위한 요청을 완료할 수 없는 경우는 PersistenceException를 발생 시킵니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, you can throw the PersistenceException with an appropriate message to indicate any error condition encountered by your service that prevents it from fulfilling a request made by the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: 파생 시켜 유지 서비스를 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>클래스 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>클래스, 워크플로 런타임 엔진에 의해 요청을 수행 하지 못하게 하는 서비스에 의해 발생 한 오류 조건을 나타내는 적절 한 메시지와 함께 PersistenceException throw 할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService> class for more information.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> 지정된 된 메시지를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and the specified <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> 클래스 지정을 사용 하 여 <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 및 지정 된 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 스트림을 통해 전송 된 예외 개체를 다시 구성 하기 위해 역직렬화 하는 동안 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=108569&clcid=0x409).
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 직렬화 된 개체 데이터를 보유 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that holds contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>소스 또는 대상에 대 한 컨텍스트 정보를 보유 하는.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> by using the specified message and <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"> </xref> 지정한 메시지 및 <xref:System.Exception>.</xref:System.Exception> 를 사용 하 여

trans-unit.source: A description of the cause of the exception.
The exception that caused the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException"></xref> to be thrown.
